mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT O.STORE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, O.STORE_NO STORE_NO, O.STORE_ORDER_DATE ORDER_DATE, O.PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, O.STORE_ORDER_EA ORDER_EA, O.STORE_ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS, O.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, S.STATUS_NAME STATUS_NAME FROM STORE_ORDER O LEFT JOIN STATUS S ON O.STORE_ORDER_STATUS = S.STATUS_ID ORDER BY O.STORE_ORDER_DATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT STORE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, STORE_NO STORE_NO, STORE_ORDER_DATE ORDER_DATE, PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, STORE_ORDER_EA ORDER_EA, STORE_ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS, EMP_CODE EMP_CODE FROM STORE_ORDER WHERE STORE_ORDER_STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY STORE_ORDER_DATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT O.STORE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, O.STORE_NO STORE_NO, O.STORE_ORDER_DATE ORDER_DATE, O.STORE_ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS, O.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, S.STATUS_NAME STATUS_NAME FROM STORE_ORDER O LEFT JOIN STATUS S ON O.STORE_ORDER_STATUS = S.STATUS_ID WHERE STORE_ORDER_STATUS LIKE #{type} ORDER BY STORE_ORDER_DATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT S.STORE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, S.STORE_NO STORE_NO, S.STORE_ORDER_DATE ORDER_DATE, S.STORE_ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS, S.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME EMP_NAME, ST.STATUS_NAME STATUS_NAME, STO.STORE_NAME STORE_NAME FROM STORE_ORDER S LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN STATUS ST ON S.STORE_ORDER_STATUS = ST.STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN STORE STO ON S.STORE_NO = STO.STORE_NO ORDER BY S.STORE_ORDER_DATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT S.STORE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, S.STORE_ORDER_DATE ORDER_DATE, S.STORE_NO STORE_NO, S.PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, S.STORE_ORDER_EA ORDER_EA, S.STORE_ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS, S.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, P.PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, P.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, ST.STORE_NAME STORE_NAME, E.EMP_NAME EMP_NAME, STA.STATUS_NAME STATUS_NAME FROM STORE_ORDER S LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN STORE ST ON S.STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN STATUS STA ON S.STORE_ORDER_STATUS = STA.STATUS_ID WHERE S.STORE_ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO} ORDER BY S.STORE_ORDER_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_ORDER ( STORE_ORDER_NO, STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, STORE_ORDER_EA, STORE_ORDER_STATUS, EMP_CODE) VALUES ( #{ORDER_NO}, #{STORE_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{ORDER_EA}, #{ORDER_STATUS}, #{EMP_CODE})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM STORE_ORDER WHERE STORE_ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}) as isChk;
